meanings.definition: A subtitled version of a foreign film or television show created by fans.
meanings.sent1: I watched a fansub of my favorite anime last night.
meanings.sent2: Fansubs are a great way to enjoy foreign shows that haven't been officially released.
meanings.sent3: The fansub had a funny typo that made the characters say silly things.
meanings.sent4: The fansub was like a magical bridge that connected me to a whole new world.
meanings.sent5: The fansub made the dialogue crystal clear and easy to understand.

meanings.definition: To create subtitles for a foreign film or television show as a fan.
meanings.sent1: I love to fansub my favorite dramas to share with others.
meanings.sent2: Fansubbing can be a challenging but rewarding hobby.
meanings.sent3: I fansubbed a movie for my friend's birthday as a surprise gift.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to fansub quickly and accurately was like a superpower.
meanings.sent5: Fansubbing requires attention to detail and a love for the content.
